name: Gmail - Planets theme tweaks (new compact layout)
description: Gives message entries a blue hue instead of just black, adds more contrast in the text in the message entries, highlights the message that the mouse is over, highlights the current folder/label on the left, and makes the background solid for messages and contacts.
additional_info: 5/18/2014 - in the label list, made text italic for a collapsed label containing unread messages in itself or its sublabels
